definition: (of soil) unstable, the act of moving from one place to another
details:
adjective
- (of soil) unstable
= example: (of soil) unstable
= synonyms: unfirm
- changing position or direction
= example: changing position or direction
= synonyms: shifty
- continuously varying
= example: continuously varying
noun
- the act of moving from one place to another
= example: the act of moving from one place to another
= synonyms: shift
